mapper.insert: insert into user (user_idx, user_id, password, nickname, email, level, badge_idx, reg_date, update_date, last_login, del_yn) values (#{user_idx}, #{user_id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, 1, 1, #{reg_date}, #{update_date}, null, 'N')
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from user where user_id = #{user_id}
select COUNT(*) from user where email = #{email}
select * from user where user_id = #{user_id} and password = #{password}
select user_id from user where email = #{email}
mapper.update: update * set user where password = #{password} where email = #{email}
